chat.welcomeSubtitle: How can I help you trade today?
chat.fileUploadFailed: file(s) failed to upload. You can retry them.
chat.noInternet: No internet connection. Your messages won't send until you're back online.

hero.subtitle: Institutional-grade market intelligence through natural conversation. Backtest strategies, analyze patterns, and execute with precision—all in one interface.

what.title: CURSOR IS FOR DEVELOPERS. PELICAN IS FOR TRADERS.
what.description1: Stop juggling between TradingView, spreadsheets, and ChatGPT. Pelican is the unified AI platform that understands markets the way you do—through conversation.
what.description2: Ask complex questions. Get structured answers with real data. Share branded analysis with one click. This is how trading intelligence should work.
what.platformCommand: backtest momentum strategy on SPY, last 6 months

features.title: TRADING INTELLIGENCE, NOT ANOTHER TOOL TO LEARN
features.justAskDesc: Type questions like you'd ask a trading buddy. "What's moving in semis today?" "Show me SPY's worst drawdowns." No syntax, no learning curve.
features.testIdeasDesc: Describe any strategy in plain English and see if it actually works. Win rates, drawdowns, Sharpe ratios—without writing a single line of code.
features.knowsStyleDesc: Pelican remembers your positions, your watchlist, and how you like to trade. Every conversation picks up where you left off.
features.findsWhatDesc: Surface unusual volume, divergences, and setups across thousands of tickers. Let AI do the scanning while you focus on decisions.
features.shareProDesc: Generate branded tables and analysis ready for Twitter, Discord, or clients. One click from insight to shareable content.
features.killChaosDesc: Stop bouncing between TradingView, spreadsheets, and ChatGPT. One interface for research, analysis, and idea generation.

traders.title: PELICAN FOR EVERY TRADER
traders.subtitle: Whether you're just starting or managing millions, Pelican speaks your language
traders.newTraderQuestion: Is this TSLA dip worth buying?
traders.experiencedTraderQuestion: The QQQ's closed down over -3% today. Using QQQ data for 2025, find every instance the QQQ's closed down -3% in a single day, and give me the 2 week return of the QQQ's following that event.

languages.title: AVAILABLE IN 30+ LANGUAGES
languages.subtitle: Pelican speaks your language, wherever you trade

team.title: BUILT BY TRADERS, FOR TRADERS
team.nickBio: Eight years across futures, FX, and digital assets. Former crypto arbitrage systems architect turned systems-driven strategist. Founded Pelican to challenge the industry's dependence on opaque tools and build an AI that thinks the way real traders operate—structured, contextual, and brutally honest.
team.rayBio: Two decades building mission-critical financial infrastructure. Led NYSE's transition to electronic trading at Labranche, architecting ultra-low latency systems across 800+ symbols. Deep expertise in C++ high-performance systems, exchange connectivity, and modern crypto infrastructure.

pricing.title: CREDIT-BASED PRICING THAT SCALES WITH YOU
pricing.creditsExplainer: Credits represent analytical workload, not raw API calls. Simple questions cost less. Complex analysis costs more. You always know what you're spending.
pricing.basicAnalysisExample: "Is NVDA overbought?" / "Show me AAPL's moving averages"
pricing.eventStudyExample: "How does SPY react after CPI?" / "Compare AAPL vs MSFT"
pricing.deepAnalysisExample: "Backtest this strategy 1 year" / "Show institutional flow on SPY"
pricing.marketComparisonDesc: Pelican delivers the analysis power of institutional terminals at a fraction of the cost.

cta.subtitle: Join traders who've upgraded from scattered tools to unified intelligence.
